message: Let's split it 4:1, a fair start!
I'll take 80%,  you take 20%. It's a fair deal since the money will lose value with each round.
I'll take 60%, you take 40%. It's a fair compromise, considering the inflation!
Let's split it 70/30.  We're both losing money with each round, so we need to be realistic.
I'll take 45%, you take 55%. It's getting close to the end, let's make a deal!
